A new cosmography, or, Survey of the whole world in six ingenious and comprehensive discourses, with a previous discourse, being a new project for bringing up young men to learning / humbly dedicated to the Honourable Henry Lyttelton, Esq. by Guy Miege, Gent. Miege, Guy, 1644-1718?
[4], 146 [i.e. 148] p., 2 leaves of plates.
Printed for Thomas Basset ..., London : 1682.
Advertisement: prelim. p. [3]. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
